channel.description: Week 5 Announcements This Week Mon: Lab 2 Due 11:59 PM Mon: Discussion 1 Due 11:59 PM Oct 4?: Lab 3 Monday 7 PM Lab 2 Grading Canvas Only No Meeting Required Lab 3 Core Network Services Set IP Addresses Install DNS & DHCP Install SNMP See Hints & Diagrams Ask Questions! Vacation Oct 1 - 10 Limited Email/Discord Shoot for Lab 3 Sept 30? Lab 4 Oct 18 Keep in Touch! Discussions on Discord https://discordbot.cs.ksu.edu Zoom Discussions - Thursday 3:30 "Tea Time" Office Hours Tuesday 3:30 | Friday 10:30 One-on-One Office Hours
